app.schemas package

Submodules

app.schemas.collection_schemas module

The module defines Pydantic schemas for managing collections. Includes schemas for inserting, selecting, updating, deleting, and listing collections.

class app.schemas.user_schemas.UserUpdateRequest(*, first_name: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=2), MaxLen(max_length=40)], last_name: Annotated[str, MinLen(min_length=2), MaxLen(max_length=40)], user_signature: Annotated[str | None, MaxLen(max_length=40)] = None, user_contacts: Annotated[str | None, MaxLen(max_length=512)] = None)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

Pydantic schema for request to update a user entity. Requires the user ID, first and last name, and optionally user signature and user contacts.
